title: Giving meaning and reliability to Bard W
body:
Bard's W is contender for the worst spell in the game. I'll get to the point:

Chimes are RNG driven, it should make sense that bard attracts them. Caretaker's shrines should have an additional scaling: chime attraction.

For example, at rank 1 W has 10% more chance to have chimes spawn close to it, as long as it lives. -> 20% 30% 40% 50%.

W can be given a set duration like Teemo Shrooms if this mechanic was feared to be abused, regardless Bard should still max W last unless trying to recover from a poor early game.

Giving Bard meaningful decisions to his costly spell and more control over his skirmishing capability.

Yeah?

I'd like to note the reason behind this change: 
This isn't necessarily about the balance of Bard; this is for the feel of the character and overall enjoyment.
